content: Hello, I'm looking for example C-CDA on FHIR Document Bundles. The IG shows an example Composition, but am looking for a complete document or three for MU3 specifically. Any help is appreciated.

Hi Chris, you could use the Qvera FHIR Starter Kit CDA to FHIR Demo at http://qvera.com:20017 to convert your own MU3 documents into a FHIR Document Bundle. It provides a way to validate the resultant Bundle against some of the public facing FHIR STU3 servers. Maybe that will help?
Oh, thanks Ron! I'll give it a shot.
